START.getting_started_value:
â€¢ Gunakake `/daily` kanggo njupuk poin saben dina
â€¢ Coba `/texttr` kanggo terjemahan pisanan
â€¢ Priksa `/shop` kanggo upgrade sementara
â€¢ Gunakake `/help` kanggo dhaptar perintah lengkap
START.admin_tips_value:
â€¢ Gunakake `/setchannel` kanggo mbatesi terjemahan ing saluran utawa basa tartamtu
â€¢ Gunakake `/invite` kanggo nambah Muse ing server liyane
â€¢ Gunakake `/help` kanggo kabeh perintah
START.daily_claimed_value: Wangsul maneh sesuk kanggo poin liyane!
START.voice_commands_value:
`/voicechat [sumber] [tujuan]` - Terjemahan obrolan suara langsung
`/voicechat2 [basa1] [basa2]` - Terjemahan loro arah sing ditingkatake
`/voice [teks] [sumber] [tujuan]` - Teks dadi ucapan
`/speak [teks] [sumber] [tujuan]` - Terjemahake lan puterake ing saluran swara
START.text_commands_value:
`/texttr [teks] [sumber] [tujuan]` - Terjemahake teks
`/autotranslate [sumber] [tujuan]` - Otomatis nerjemahake kabeh pesen panjenengan
`/read [id_pesan] [tujuan]` - Terjemahake pesen miturut ID
`/dmtr [pangguna] [teks] [sumber] [tujuan]` - Kirim DM sing wis diterjemahake
START.achievements_value:
`/achievements` - Deleng kemajuan prestasi
`/rewards` - Priksa poin lan peringkat panjenengan
`/cashout` - Ngonversi poin prestasi dadi poin aktivitas
`/daily` - Njupuk poin saben dina
`/shop` - Blanja ing toko poin
`/buy [item]` - Tuku item saka toko
`/buypoints [jumlah]` - Tuku poin tambahan
`/gift [jumlah]` - Menehi kanca poin
`/profile` - Deleng profil panjenengan
`/leaderboard` - Deleng pangguna top
`/transactions` - Deleng riwayat transaksi poin
START.settings_value:
`/hide` utawa `/show` - Ganti visibilitas teks asli
`/preferences` - Sesuaikan preferensi basa
`/history` - Deleng riwayat terjemahan
`/list` - Deleng kabeh basa sing didhukung
`/upgrade` - Buka fitur premium
`/help` - Dhaptar lengkap perintah
`/stop` - Akhiri sesi terjemahan
START.community_value:
`/feedback` - Menehi rating lan review Muse (oleh poin!)
`/reviews` - Deleng pendapat pangguna liyane
`/invite` - Bagikna Muse karo kanca-kanca (oleh poin!)
`/vote` - Dhukung bot iki ing situs bot-listing (oleh poin!)
START.upgrade_benefits_value:
ğŸ¥‰ **Dasar ($1/sasi):** 500 karakter, 1 jam swara, akses riwayat
ğŸ¥ˆ **Premium ($3/sasi):** 2000 karakter, 2 jam swara, prioritas proses
ğŸ¥‡ **Pro ($5/sasi):** Kabeh tanpa watesan + fitur beta
START.premium_active_value:
â€¢ Wates ditingkatake: {text_limit} karakter
â€¢ Wektu swara: {voice_limit} menit
â€¢ Pengganda poin: {multiplier}
â€¢ Matur nuwun wis ndhukung Muse! ğŸ’–
START.language_format_value:
Panjenengan bisa nggunakake jeneng utawa kode basa:
â€¢ Jeneng: `English`, `Spanish`, `Japanese`
â€¢ Kode: `en`, `es`, `ja`
â€¢ Conto: `/texttr text:'Hello World' source_lang:English target_lang:Spanish`

START.footer_dm: Mode Pangguna: Cocok kanggo DM | Gabung karo server dhukungan: discord.gg/VMpBsbhrff

LIST.title: Basa Sing Kasedhiya Kanggo Terjemahan
LIST.description: Iki dhaptar kabeh basa sing isa digunakakÃ© karo penerjemah:

HELP.title: ğŸ¤– Muse Translator - Dhaptar Perintah
HELP.description: Iki dhaptar kabeh perintah sing kasedhiya:
HELP.reward_value:
`/daily` - Klaim hadiah poin saben dina
`/shop` - Jelajah toko hadiah
`/buy [reward]` - Tuku hadiah nganggo poin
`/profile [user]` - Deleng profil lan statistik
`/rewards` - Deleng hadiah aktif
`/gift [user] [amount]` - Paringi poin marang wong liya
HELP.social_value:
`/leaderboard` - Deleng pangguna paling dhuwur miturut poin
`/achievements` - Deleng lencana lan pencapaianmu
`/cashout` - Tukar poin pencapaian kanggo belanja ing `/shop`
`/transactions` - Deleng riwayat transaksi poin
HELP.setup_value_user:
`/start` - Inisialisasi penerjemah
